param.name: dateformat
param.label: Date format
param.description: Choose your preferred date format. All dates will be shown in this format.

param.name: currency
param.label: Currency
param.description: Select your preferred currency.

param.name: width
param.label: Room category thumbnail width
param.description: This is the width of the room category thumbnail, displayed in booking search results. You can upload images of any size in /images/bookit/images and BooKiTGold will create the thumbnails.

param.name: height
param.label: Room category thumbnail height
param.description: This is the height of the room category thumbnail, displayed in booking search results. You can upload images of any size in /images/bookit/images and BooKiTGold will create the thumbnails.

param.name: extra_availability
param.label: Extra availability state
param.description: Define the name of the additional availability state. Predefined are Available, Booked and Pending.

param.name: available_color
param.label: Available color
param.description: Define the color in hex code for Available days.

param.name: booked_color
param.label: Booked color
param.description: Define the color in hex code for Booked days.

param.name: pending_color
param.label: Pending color
param.description: Define the color in hex code for Pending days.

param.name: other_color
param.label: Extra availability state color
param.description: Define the color in hex code for the extra availability state.

param.name: show_available
param.label: Show available days?
param.description: State if you want available days to be visible in the front-end calendar.

param.name: show_booked
param.label: Show booked days?
param.description: State if you want booked days to be visible in the front-end calendar.

param.name: show_pending
param.label: Show pending days?
param.description: State if you want pending days to be visible in the front-end calendar.

param.name: show_extra
param.label: Show extra availability state days?
param.description: State if you want days in the extra availability state to be visible in the front-end calendar.

param.name: show_coupons
param.label: Show coupons?
param.description: State if you want your visitors to be able to enter coupon codes in front-end.

param.name: deposit_percent
param.label: Required deposit (percentage)
param.description: Enter the amount of deposit you require as a deposit for a booking. Leave this empty if you do not want to accept payments or if you want to define fixed amount for deposits. Do not use % symbol.

param.name: deposit_fixed
param.label: Required deposit (fixed)
param.description: Enter the amount of deposit you require as a deposit for a booking. Leave this empty if you do not want to accept payments or if you want to define percentage amount for deposits.

param.name: terms_conditions
param.label: Terms and Conditions
param.description: Enter the Terms and Conditions of your hotel.

param.name: cancellation_policy
param.label: Cancellation Policy
param.description: Enter the Cancellation Policy of your hotel.

param.name: form_msg
param.label: Custom form message
param.description: Enter a custom message to be disblayed above the booking details form

param.name: contact_details
param.label: Mail signature
param.description: Enter your mail signature to be included in the confirmation mails sent after booking requests or booking confirmations.

param.name: email_logo
param.label: Email logo image
param.description: Enter the name of a file you want to use as a header-logo in all emails sent. Upload the file in /images/bookit/images and use jpeg or gif format.

param.name: paypal_mail
param.label: Paypal email
param.description: Enter the email you use in your paypal account.

param.name: payment_return
param.label: Successful payment URL
param.description: Enter the absolute or relative path to an article where the user will be redirected after a successful payment. Do not use external URLS

param.name: payment_cancel
param.label: Uncompleted payment URL
param.description: Enter the absolute or relative path to an article that the user will be redirected after an uncompleted payment. Do not use external URLS.
